participant_1.background:
I have a few pet iguanas.
I am pretty poor financially.
I have a brother but we do not talk much yet.
I like to give them sassy sounding names that actually help people think nice things.

participant_2.background:
My dream is to own my own restaurant.
I work as a grill cook.
My favorite band is pink floyd.
Running is a hobby.
I am looking for a second job.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you. How are you?
I'm doing well too, thank you. I'm interested in your job as a grill cook. What's it like?
It's very fast-paced and demanding, but it's also very rewarding. I love being able to cook delicious food for people.
That sounds really interesting. I've always wanted to try being a chef.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the advice.
No problem. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and watch movies. I also have a few pet iguanas.
Iguanas! That's so cool. I've never had a pet reptile before.
They're really great pets. They're very low-maintenance and they're very friendly.
Maybe I'll get one someday.
You should! They're great.
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy". It's a really funny book.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a lot of fun.
So, what kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I'm especially into adventure games.
Adventure games are my favorite too. I love exploring new worlds and solving puzzles.
Me too! They're so much fun.
So, what are your favorite movies?
I like all kinds of movies, but I'm especially into science fiction and fantasy movies.
Me too! I love movies that take me to other worlds.
Me too! I think that's why I like science fiction and fantasy movies so much. They let me escape from the real world for a while.
Me too! They're the best.
